ReplaceChild will replace a child [DOMNode DOMNode] with a new [DOMNode DOMNode]. If success, it will return the new child node, otherwise it will return false.

==Parameters==
|| *Name* || *Type* || *Description* ||
|| NewChild || [DOMNode DOMNode] || The new child ||
|| RefChild || [DOMNode DOMNode] || The child that is to be replaced ||
